text: [Music]
I wanted to come to HPS to uh first of
all further my education because I
needed a graduate um training and also
because of the leadership focus of the
school so I really wanted to uh become
an effective manager before HPS I
co-founded an NGO that is dedicated to
empowering deprived communities in
Africa through education and Vocational
trainings what we did with my NGO was
work with communities in Mali morania
and DRC and help them set up a school
and really upscu their youth so that
people don't end up just going on the
fields or staying at home unemployed but
they can create their own businesses and
they can read and write to me making a
difference is not just going in Africa
and offering money for them to buy food
or things like that I want to really
Empower them to car to their own needs
so by providing people jobs uh in
different communities you Empower those
people to really pay for their health
care bills pay for their shoes their
houses so without removing their own
dignity as long as we can sort of
balance the various kinds so by coming
here and becoming a better leader an
international leader and going back to
Africa I'm bringing resources and
knowledge from all around the world and
trying to enhance the visibility of the
continent in a great
[Music]
way
